caption:
🍬 #GIVEAWAY CLOSED 🍬 @smarties and @blendjet are back again this holiday season to gift 2️⃣ lucky winners a $100 BlendJet gift card and a Smarties assortment worth over $100!💖

To Enter:
1. Follow @smarties and @blendjet
2. Like and Save this post
3. Tag your bestie in the comments (1 comment = 1 entry)️

⭐️ BONUS ENTRY: Share this post to your story!

(Two winners will be chosen at random and notified on 12/9 via DM on Instagram from one of these official accounts (@blendjet or @smarties) ONLY. Do not fall for spam accounts! Giveaway open until 12/8 at 11:59pm PST. Open to the U.S. Only, 18+. This giveaway is in no way sponsored, endorsed, administered by, or associated with Meta.)
